short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Extension hides Stories section from popular American online social media and social networking service

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
What Stories are? 

Stories is the answer to popular snaps. Find your friends stories in the main parts of the channel. 
You can shoot a maximum of 20 seconds of video, save them in the phone's memory and of course share them - publicly or selected friends. 
If someone sends you their video, you can learn about two before they disappear.

What does this extension do?

This extension allow you to hide stories section from homepage but keep whole functionality.
